name: Kiril Morozov
story: Kiril Morozov was born in Moscow, Russia. He served in the Russian Armed Forces for over 20 years before being discharged for insubordination. After his discharge, he joined the Wagner Group, a private military company, as a mercenary. Kiril is known for his ability to remain calm in high-pressure situations and his exceptional marksmanship. He is a solitary man who keeps to himself, preferring the company of his weapons to that of people.
